Class Board

java.lang.Object
Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Board class to deal with the locations of pieces and adding / removing pieces
Version:
May 27, 2021
Author:
Oliver

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static char emptyCh
    Empty character that fills the board

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Board()
    Creates the empty board (2D array serves as location)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int[] addPiece​(Player player, int column)
    Adds piece to board
    int[] checkPiece​(Player player, int column)
    Adds a piece to the board, but doesn't end game when finds a connect4
    boolean checkTie()
    Checks if the board is full
    void clearBoard()
    Clears the board of all pieces
    void clearSpace​(int row, int col)
    Clears a certain space on the board
    char getChar​(int row, int col)
    Getter method for a character in the board
    boolean getContinue()
    Getter method for whether to continue the game or not
    void printBoard()
    Prints the board to console
    void setContinue​(boolean b)
    Setter method for whether to continue the game or not

      Empty character that fills the board

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Creates the empty board (2D array serves as location)

  • Method Details

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard()
      Prints the board to console

    • addPiece

      public int[] addPiece​(Player player, int column)
      Adds piece to board
      Parameters:
      player - - player's piece
      column - - column to place piece
      Returns:
      array of row, col where piece was placed

    • checkPiece

      public int[] checkPiece​(Player player, int column)
      Adds a piece to the board, but doesn't end game when finds a connect4
      Parameters:
      player - - player whose piece is to be added
      column - - column piece is to be placed
      Returns:
      coords of piece or just {row} if it completes a connect4

    • clearBoard

      public void clearBoard()
      Clears the board of all pieces

    • clearSpace

      public void clearSpace​(int row, int col)
      Clears a certain space on the board
      Parameters:
      row - - row of space
      col - - column of space

    • checkTie

      public boolean checkTie()
      Checks if the board is full
      Returns:
      whether the board is full

    • getContinue

      public boolean getContinue()
      Getter method for whether to continue the game or not
      Returns:
      whether to continue

    • setContinue

      public void setContinue​(boolean b)
      Setter method for whether to continue the game or not
      Parameters:
      b - - whether to continue

    • getChar

      public char getChar​(int row, int col)
      Getter method for a character in the board
      Parameters:
      row - - row of space to check
      col - - column of space to check
      Returns:
      piece at space specified
